channel.title: Runescape Ban Bug ftw
channel.description:
So it appears as though if you go to buy Wheel of Fortune spins, but log back in quickly before it before the exchange window opens when you're in the lobby, you'll get back into the game, and as soon as you close the finished loading window to buy spins, you'll somehow receive a rather large amount of botting offenses.
[img]http://www.freemmorpgmaker.com/files/imagehost/pics/c026771875d3e1a01d87786e8dcc70ee.png[/img]
Jagex trolling all day everyday.

LOLOL. GF you

item.title: Runescape Ban Bug ftw
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

You guys are making a big deal about something so simple… Try doing anyone with 5 Thieving or Herblore in Taverley or Burthrope. They made it like that so they can get the feel of training member skills if they were to become a member.

When I first started playing, there wasn’t trials, ‘demo levels’ or any of that crap. It was either you’re a member and can train the xp, or you’re not and you’re stuck with F2P.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Ban Bug ftw
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

You guys are making a big deal about something so simple… Try doing anyone with 5 Thieving or Herblore in Taverley or Burthrope. They made it like that so they can get the feel of training member skills if they were to become a member.

It also released low level range and mage pots to f2p, added climbing boots, and a few other things that made p2p pking special.

On the topic of automated bans, saying certain phrases relating to gambling will get you a nice 48hr one

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Ban Bug ftw
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:15, topic:508227”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=626466.msg4261011#msg4261011 date=1363461333]

I found another bug… I logged in and got +31,000,000 XP (but it didn’t actually add), it scared the shit out of me and now a bunch of my stats are down to 9.

[im g]http://img521.imageshack.us/img521/2108/ehr8.png[/img]
[/quote]New feature <3 You can now level up member skills as a f2p player, although it has a limit.

Yeah, they keep releasing members shit to non members…

Because non-members should only have 10% of the available skills, combat skills & items, right? Gtfo, RSF2P is so messed up right now[/quote]
It’s one thing to promise members content that non members don’t get. But to turn around and release that content to non members. That’s not cool. I remember back in like 06 when you went to pay for membership, that was one of the big promotions to get members, was that they got about double the skills to work on, and 5x+ the game play.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Ban Bug ftw

item.description:

It’s their way of telling you you’re absolutely pathetic if you were really going to buy virtual property for a shitty game that doesn’t even matter.
[/quote]

I wasn’t planning on buying any spins, I was just clicking around stuff as I haven’t played runescape in a very long time.

Although, if I really wanted to buy virtual currency on runescape, I’d just go to a site like playerauctions.[/quote]
Lol… IMO, Funorb’s Arcanists Is way more fun >.>

It’s their way of telling you you’re absolutely pathetic if you were really going to buy virtual property for a shitty game that doesn’t even matter.
